dcterms:description: This dataset provides information on the percentage of renewable energy consumption as part of the total final energy consumption, highlighting the role of renewable energy in achieving sustainable energy goals.
dcterms:title: Renewable energy consumption in % of total final energy consumption

dcterms:description: This dataset contains data on the percentage of renewable electricity consumption relative to total electricity consumption, providing insights into the transition towards renewable energy sources in electricity generation.
dcterms:title: Renewable electricity consumption in % of total electricity consumption

dcterms:description: This dataset provides statistics on research and development budgets in energy technology, offering insights into the financial commitments made towards advancing energy technologies.
dcterms:title: Research and development budget

dcterms:description: This dataset includes information on electric power consumption measured in kilowatt-hours per capita, which is essential for understanding energy usage patterns and the impact of energy policies.
dcterms:title: Electric power consumption (kWh per capita)

dcterms:description: This dataset provides GDP per capita data in current US dollars, which is a critical economic indicator that can influence energy consumption and investment in renewable energy.
dcterms:title: GDP per capita (current US$)

dcterms:description: This dataset provides information on median and median income per household type, which can be relevant for understanding socio-economic factors influencing energy consumption and transition.
dcterms:title: Median and median income per household type

dcterms:description: This dataset contains information on climate change laws from a global database, which can provide insights into the legal frameworks influencing energy transition policies.
dcterms:title: Climate change law from the world database
